entry.title: Fee Budgets: A Possible Path Towards Unified Cost Functions For Lightning Pathfinding Problems
entry.summary: The discussion is centered around the topic of alternative pathfinding and whether cost should be represented as a number. The focus is on the minimum cost flow algorithms and the operations that are demanded of the "cost" datatype. The question being asked is whether it is possible to provide these operations using a different structure than numbers. The main point is to determine the minimal interface required by the mincostflow algorithm for the "cost" datatype.
